bibl.title: Carrying off and Bringing Home the Statues of the Gods. On an Aspect of the Religious Policy of the Ptolemies towards the Egyptians.
bibl.note: I. A Review of Data Concerning the Relocation of Statues in the Ancient World. - II. The Evidence for Carrying the Statues off from Egypt. - III. Sources Concerning the Retrieval of Statues by the Ptolemies. - IV. Conclusions.
bibl.seg: WINNICKI Jan Krzysztof, Carrying off and Bringing Home the Statues of the Gods. On an Aspect of the Religious Policy of the Ptolemies towards the Egyptians.

I. A Review of Data Concerning the Relocation of Statues in the Ancient World. - II. The Evidence for Carrying the Statues off from Egypt. - III. Sources Concerning the Retrieval of Statues by the Ptolemies. - IV. Conclusions.
